full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Announcement: Industrial Shredder System

#### Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) seeks offers from Offerors to provide an Industrial Shredder System for Textile, Plastic, and Hard Drive Destruction.

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4149983232-Doc4228071822
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4149983232
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: October 19, 2023, 14:00 EDT

#### Background

Canada is seeking to acquire an Industrial Shredder System capable of processing Textile, Plastic, and Hard Drive Destruction. The system will be used by the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### Mandatory Technical Criteria

Offerors must clearly demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criteria. Failure to do so will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive and given no further consideration.

#### Submission Guidelines

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 19, 2023, at 14:00 EDT via [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17611839?extsite=MTc2MTE4MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Late submissions will not be accepted.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Christopher Casale (SPAC/PSPC)
christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: 343-575-5249

#### Trade Agreements

This tender designation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Location

The contracting authorities are located in Ontario, Canada (except the National Capital Region).

#### Contracting Entity

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC) is the contracting entity responsible for this tender opportunity.

See the attached notice for more information.
